channel.title: Server wont hold connection?!
channel.description:
Okay.. Im not good with computers, but I did download Moparscape. I was playing it getting to know it and then all of a sudden my 'hybrid server' wouldnt hold the connection. I spwaned a amulet of fury, equiped it and now it's worn as a weapon and my pickaxe is my neckless.. REALLY what I want to know is how to play on other peoples servers so Im not so lonely.. If any of you could tell me what to do or what just post and please help me out.
Thanks,
I Rc and Wc.[br][size=1]Posted at: December 04, 2006, 10:31:55 PM[/size][hr]PS.
I downloaded it out of this guys
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,7906.0.html
signature like he said.

item.title: Server wont hold connection?!
item.dc:creator: @i_rc_and_wc i rc and wc
item.description:
@i_rc_and_wc wrote:

i have like no clue what you’re talking about… i dont think i have a character folder =? and where do i download a source? i told you, i used that guys signature like he said.

Read full topic

item.title: Server wont hold connection?!
item.dc:creator: @redb0yf0xb0y redb0yf0xb0y
item.description:
@redb0yf0xb0y wrote:

you dont have the fury in your item database. to make u stop lagging open ur characters folder and go into equipment and delete the line that has 6585 in it. to make it so u dont lag anymore u need the right item.cfg which u can get by downloading a source. i reccoment using that source instead of the hybrid one…

Read full topic
